abstract: Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences releases new rules regulating behavior of its members for upcoming Academy Awards season, including provision that limits their attendance of receptions and nonscreening events.

headline.print_headline: Academy Announces New Rules for Oscars
headline.main: Oscar Voters on Notice: Careful With the Caviar

keywords.value: Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: The Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences announced new rules to curb party practices that may “unduly influence” its members....
lead_paragraph: The Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences announced new rules to curb party practices that may “unduly influence” its members.
